class.name: Phaser.RequestAnimationFrame

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

parameters.name: forceSetTimeOut
parameters.help: Tell Phaser to use setTimeOut even if raf is available.

class.help: Abstracts away the use of RAF or setTimeOut for the core game update loop.

public.name: start
public.help: Starts the requestAnimationFrame running or setTimeout if unavailable in browser

public.name: updateRAF
public.help: The update method for the requestAnimationFrame

public.name: updateSetTimeout
public.help: The update method for the setTimeout.

public.name: forceSetTimeOut
public.inlineHelp: Tell Phaser to use setTimeOut even if raf is available.

public.name: isRunning
public.inlineHelp: true if RequestAnimationFrame is running, otherwise false.

private.name: _isSetTimeOut
private.inlineHelp: - true if the browser is using setTimeout instead of raf.

private.name: _onLoop
private.inlineHelp: The function called by the update.

private.name: _timeOutID
private.inlineHelp: The callback ID used when calling cancel.
